    • coordinatorOnVoteResponse

      public void coordinatorOnVoteResponse(@NotNull @NotNull Utils.VoteResponse msg)
      Register a Node vote. Then, if the quorum is reached or everybody voted, fix the decision and multicast the decision.
      Parameters:
      msg - request to make a vote
